channel.title: CVE Feed for hit-reach -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for hit-reach -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4994|2023-09-16T01:52:17.856Z -- hit-reach -- allow%20php%20in%20posts%20and%20pages
item.description: The Allow PHP in Posts and Pages plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Remote Code Execution in versions up to, and including, 3.0.4 via the 'php' shortcode. This allows authenticated attackers with subscriber-level permissions or above, to execute code on the server.
